Tunable.name: BlockAreaLarge
Tunable.description: Lower Bound for a large block.

Tunable.name: BlockAreaMedium
Tunable.description: Lower Bound for a medium block.

Tunable.name: EmptyFacetPreviewHeight
Tunable.description: Height of the empty facet preview.

TunableTuple.name: EmptyFacetPreviewTintAndOpacity
TunableTuple.description: Tint and opacity of empty facet preview.

Tunable.name: ErrorNumAttemptsToInitial
Tunable.description: Error message occurs after this number of attempts

Tunable.name: ErrorNumAttemptsToRepeated
Tunable.description: Same error message repeats every n number of attempts, or...

Tunable.name: ErrorNumSecondsToRepeated
Tunable.description: ...same error message repeats every n seconds, whichever comes first.

Tunable.name: FoundationDarkeningDistance
Tunable.description: Height of the gradient, in meters, from the ground.

Tunable.name: FoundationDarkeningIntensity
Tunable.description: Intensity scale for the bottom of exterior walls.

TunableTuple.name: MagalogHighlight
TunableTuple.description: Magalog item highlight.

TunableTuple.name: MagalogOutline
TunableTuple.description: Magalog item outline

TunableTuple.name: OutlineColorAndOpacity
TunableTuple.description: Outline that indicates that the buildbuy item is highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: OutlineColorAndOpacityChild1
TunableTuple.description: Outline for start of the gradient that indicates that the buildbuy item is a child of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: OutlineColorAndOpacityChild2
TunableTuple.description: Outline for end of the gradient that indicates that the buildbuy item is a child of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: OutlineColorAndOpacityCousin
TunableTuple.description: Outline that indicates that the buildbuy item is a cousin of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: OutlineColorAndOpacityParent1
TunableTuple.description: Outline for start of the gradient to indicate that the buildbuy item is a parent of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: OutlineColorAndOpacityParent2
TunableTuple.description: Outline for end of the gradient to indicate item is a parent of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: OutlineSpeedAndThickness
TunableTuple.description: Pulse speed and thickness for outline that indicates that the buildbuy item is highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: OutlineSpeedAndThicknessChild
TunableTuple.description: Pulse speed and thickness for outline for start of the gradient that indicates that the buildbuy item is a child of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: OutlineSpeedAndThicknessCousin
TunableTuple.description: Pulse speed and thickness for outline that indicates that the buildbuy item is a cousin of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: OutlineSpeedAndThicknessParent
TunableTuple.description: Pulse speed and thickness for outline for start of the gradient to indicate that the buildbuy item is a parent of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: OutlineSpeedAndThicknessRoot
TunableTuple.description: Pulse speed and thickness for outline that indicates that the buildbuy item the root parent of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: TintBlockingObject
TunableTuple.description: Tint to indicate objects which are blocking a user from doing an action.

TunableTuple.name: TintClobber
TunableTuple.description: Tint to indicate something will be clobbered.

TunableTuple.name: TintHighlight
TunableTuple.description: Indicates that the buildbuy item is highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: TintHighlightChild1
TunableTuple.description: Start of the gradient that indicates that the buildbuy item is a child of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: TintHighlightChild2
TunableTuple.description: End of the gradient that indicates that the buildbuy item is a child of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: TintHighlightCousin
TunableTuple.description: Indicates that the buildbuy item is a cousin of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: TintHighlightParent1
TunableTuple.description: Start of the gradient to indicate that the buildbuy item is a parent of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: TintHighlightParent2
TunableTuple.description: End of the gradient to indicate item is a parent of the one highlighted.

TunableTuple.name: TintInvalid
TunableTuple.description: Tint to indicate something is invalid.

TunableTuple.name: TintWarning
TunableTuple.description: Tint to indicate objects which are not blocking but might break gameplay.

Tunable.name: VFX_SledgeMaxScale
Tunable.description: The maximum scale to apply to the sledge VFX.

Tunable.name: VFX_SledgeMaxScaleArea
Tunable.description: The sledge drag region area at which the maximum scale should be applied.

Tunable.name: VFX_SledgeMinScale
Tunable.description: The minimum scale to apply to the sledge VFX.

Tunable.name: WallDarkeningDistance
Tunable.description: Height of the gradient, in meters, from the ground.

Tunable.name: WallDarkeningIntensity
Tunable.description: Intensity scale for the bottom of exterior walls.
